TextElement.Str:
This software is developed by 'theDNAse'. It uses Tasker as its coding language. Without Tasker (Google play link) and the Tasker App Factory (Google play link), this would never have been possible. A big thank you to members of tasker Google group for all the help during learning Tasker and also during development of TBM. And to my all my friends for being the testers for this project.

If you wish to help develop TBM, request you to donate to Tasker instead. I am happy to have found one more way to spend my time on the throne.
Notice: To fully utilize the capability of TBM use Tasker and import the TBM project instead.

This program is distributed WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. You are free to distribute it further, unmodified. Modified or otherwise, the author takes no responsibility of any issues or possible issues arising from use or misuse this program.
Notice: To fully utilize the capability of TBM use Tasker and import the TBM project instead.
Low Battery Monitor Range: In this range net shall be disabled to preserve battery. If net is manually enabled it shall be intelligently disabled on screen off, schedules do not enable it.

Action.Str: A day can't end before it begins!!
A day can't end before it begins!!
